objects.text: Pink Drop Wreath Design | Perfect Gift for Her | 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description:
- Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g.
- Item part number: ER0583.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Department: womens.
- Item Weight: 3.9 g.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters.
- Net Quantity: 2.00 count.
- Generic Name: Stud Earrings.
- Customer Reviews: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 69 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a luxurious and feminine design promoting elegant jewelry. The background is a soft radial gradient from light blush pink to delicate rose, layered with minimalistic decorative circular lines and accent dots, adding depth. At the top, bold serif text labeled as **"heading"** introduces the theme. Below, the **"subheading"** presents the product description in a clear, clean serif font. Centered is an image labeled **"product_image"**, showcasing the earrings. Beneath is a supplementary line of specs in smaller bold text, **"description"**. The **"price"** stands out prominently in dark pink tones, followed by a dark pink rectangular button (object **"cta_background"**) with high-contrast **"cta"** white text urging immediate action.

**Color Palette:**
- Blush Pink: `#FFF0F5`
- Rose Pink: `#FFD1DC`
- Deep Berry: `#880E4F`
- Crimson Rose: `#AD1457`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings featuring a soft and feminine color palette. Predominantly, rose gold (#EFA6A0) forms the structural design, offering a warm and luxurious base. Accented with shimmering white diamonds (#FFFFFF) and crystal-clear stones (#E1E1E1), the design blends matte and sparkle seamlessly. The pastel pink teardrop elements (#F7C3C1) highlight a gentle contrast against the brilliance of the stones. The blending of metallic rose tones with bright reflective surfaces creates a harmonious yet attention-grabbing look. This palette is ideal for advertisement banners targeting elegance, femininity, and luxury.
